mapper.select: select t.id,t.ocean_waybill_id,t.customer_id,t.order_case_id, t1.carton_no,t1.confirm_volume, t2.order_no,CONCAT(t2.store_goods_warehouse_name,'-',t2.destination_warehouse_name) orderLine, t5.order_id, t4.cntr_no, t3.waybill_no from ocean_waybill_case_relation t LEFT JOIN order_case t1 on t1.id = t.order_case_id LEFT JOIN order_info t2 on t2.id = t1.order_id LEFT JOIN ocean_waybill t3 on t3.id = t.ocean_waybill_id LEFT JOIN ocean_counter t4 on t4.id = t3.ocean_counter_id LEFT JOIN ocean_bill t5 on t5.id = t4.ob_id where t.ocean_waybill_id = #{oceanWaybillId}
